akn:content.akn:p:
§ 7401. Purpose The purpose of this chapter is to implement the Agreement on Port State Measures to Prevent, Deter and Eliminate Illegal, Unreported and Unregulated Fishing. (Pub. L. 114–81, title III, § 302, Nov. 5, 2015, 129 Stat. 664.)
Statutory Notes and Related Subsidiaries Short TitlePub. L. 114–81, title III, § 301, Nov. 5, 2015, 129 Stat. 664, provided that: “This title [enacting this chapter] may be cited as the ‘Port State Measures Agreement Act of 2015’.”
